A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class Button
checks if user clicked button, if clicked then update game and disable this button

B

Button - Class in <Unnamed>
Button for the tic tac toe board
Button(int, int, TicTacToeFrame) - Constructor for class Button
Constructor takes in current position of button, and also the game reference it belongs to.

C

changePlayer() - Method in class TicTacToeFrame
change turns of players

E

end() - Method in class TicTacToeFrame
returns if the game is done.
endMove() - Method in class Button
if game ends all buttons are disabled through this function

G

getPlayer() - Method in class TicTacToeFrame
return turn of the player

H

haveWinner(int, int) - Method in class TicTacToeFrame
checks if there is a winner at the current location

M

Main - Class in <Unnamed>
Main class to run the game until the game ends, by which then the game is terminated
Main() - Constructor for class Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
 

N

newMove() - Method in class Button
if new game, all buttons are re-enabled using this method

R

resetGame() - Method in class TicTacToeFrame
resets the board and starts a new game

T

TicTacToeFrame - Class in <Unnamed>
A simple tic-tac-toe game with Java swing GUI.
TicTacToeFrame() - Constructor for class TicTacToeFrame
Constructs a new Tic-Tac-Toe JFrame with 3 JPanels, one for the board, one for status, and one for menu (newgame/exit)

U

update() - Method in class TicTacToeFrame
updates the current board

W

win(String) - Method in class TicTacToeFrame
if someone wins, this method tells us we won, and changes the player name to that player.
